attributes.action: MEPs who campaigned to leave the EU to pay their salaries into the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: MEPs are paid over £100,000 per year plus expenses and it is unfair and contradictory for these members to take a salary from an organisation they disagree with belonging to.
attributes.background: Members of European Parliament for the U.K should be held accountable for their campaign promises of an extra £350million a year into the NHS by paying their salaries into this instead.
